summary: A three-way love affair in the Rome of the early seventies.
cast: Marcello Mastroianni|Monica Vitti|Giancarlo Giannini|Manuel Zarzo|Marisa Merlini|Hércules Cortés|Fernando Sánchez Polack|Gioia Desideri|Juan Diego|Bruno Scipioni|Josefina Serratosa|Giuseppe Maffioli|Corrado Gaipa|Paola Natale|Brizio Montinaro|Nerina Montagnani|Angelo Casadei|Nestore Cavaricci|Natale Tulli
title: El demonio de los celos
